articles.author: James Moultrie
articles.title: Snow, rain, rider protests and confusion end with Umbrail Pass removed from Giro d'Italia stage 16 - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Shortened 121km stage with new start expected at 14:15 CEST from Lasa
articles.content: After significant pushback from riders and teams due to concerns about racing in freezing rain and snow, race Giro d’Italia organiser RCS Sport has announced that the Umbrail Pass has been removed fr… [+3185 chars]
